Спорыньёвые - Clavicipitaceae

The Clavicipitaceae are a family of fungi within the order Hypocreales. A 2008 estimate placed 43 genera in the family, but recent work has increased this…

name: Спорыньёвые - Clavicipitaceae
comment: The Clavicipitaceae are a family of fungi within the order Hypocreales. A 2008 estimate placed 43 genera in the family, but recent work has increased this number to 97.
title: Спорыньёвые - Clavicipitaceae
